original_text: Illness has caused my skin to become black. It is not the sun that has made that happen. I stand up in the public meeting place and I call aloud for help. Illness has caused my skin to become black. It is not the sun that has made that happen. I stand up in the public meeting place and I call aloud for help. Illness has caused my skin to become black. It is not the sun that has made that happen. I stand up in the public meeting place and I call aloud for help. Illness has caused my skin to become black.
korean_text: 나는 햇볕에 쬐지 않고도 검어진 피부를 가지고 걸으며 회중 가운데 서서 도움을 부르짖고 있느니라

sentences.original_text: Illness has caused my skin to become black.
sentences.korean_translation: 병으로 인해 내 피부가 검게 변했습니다.

sentences.original_text: It is not the sun that has made that happen.
sentences.korean_translation: 그렇게 된 것은 태양 때문이 아닙니다.

sentences.original_text: I stand up in the public meeting place
and I call aloud for help.
